projectGridLines.title: Project 1  Title: Beneficiation of Illemanite to produce synthetic rutile (TiO2)  & Project 2  Title: Process development for carbon recovery from spent Li-ion batteries: A closed-loop recycling approach
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: Beneficiation of Illemanite to produce synthetic rutile (TiO2)

Description: Mineralogy, Carbothermic reduction, Kinetics study of reduction, Leaching

Skill sets: Analytical skills, Wet chemical analysis, Data Interpretation

Traits expectation: R&D approach, Literature survey, Research gap identification, Manuscript & report preparation, Experiment designing

Expected learning: Theoretical and practical skill set about reduction, leaching and process development, Kinetics model discrimination study

Specific courses required for project execution:

Project 2

Title: Process development for carbon recovery from spent Li-ion batteries: A closed-loop recycling approach

Description: Characterization of black mass, Froth flotation technique, Kinetics studies, Experiment designing, Process optimization, ANOVA & regression studies

Skill sets: Analytical skills, Data Interpretation, Characterization techniques, Physical & Chemical separation techniques

Traits expectation: R&D approach, Literature survey, Research gap identification, Manuscript & report preparation, Experiment designing

Expected learning: Proximate analysis, Statistical & experimental Designing, MINITAB software, Kinetics model discrimination study,
